name: Desert Bus for Gameboy
description:
This is a Game Boy ROM running in an emulator. You can play it here or download the ROM for use in any Game Boy emulator.

In this game, you drive a bus from Tucson, Arizona to Las Vegas, Nevada in real time.

*** The version in the emulator here is a modified version where a point is achieved after only 2 minutes, instead of 8 hours. ***

Press A (X in browser) to accelerate.

Press up/down to steer.

You can download the 2-minute version below as "desertboy-short.gb", or the full version as "desertboy.gb"
